itinerary.do: Pick up in airport areas (can be done to hotels)

staycations.name: High Days Hotel
staycations.description: Located in travel point, 1.7 km from travel point, High Days Hotel provides accommodation with a restaurant and free private parking. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and free. Built in 1956 it has old school charm and many rooms still feature high, crown-molded ceilings. A 2012 renovation brought all rooms and services up to modern day scratch and guestrooms come equipped with free Wi-Fi and all the usual amenities required for a comfortable stay.

staycations.name: Less Hotel
staycations.description: Comfortable hotel located near the travel point, an ideal hotel near travel point. in close proximity to several restaurants and activities. All rooms have private bathrooms with hot water. The rooms are cozy, yet elegant, spacious and comfortable. Each room is designed with the environment in mind. For example, strategic windows help to bring the outdoors inside.

staycations.name: White Box Hotel
staycations.description: This hotel rooms are air-conditioned with free Wi-Fi access. The guest rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Each is serviced by a lift. This Hotel has a 24-hour reception, which is hosted by a multilingual team. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning.

additionalInformation: Please wear shoes instead of sandals
pickUpServices: Free Pick-up Available. Airplane area except for the pick-up point

reviews.name: Fran G. Pani
reviews.review: A very nice place to visit, also the guide here is very helpful, he recommend a very nice spot to take a picture, and he was good at taking pictures and videos as well. He also took us to a nice place for lunch.

reviews.name: Simon Sais
reviews.review: Interesting, nice place, good experiance!

reviews.name: Amanda Hug
reviews.review: Absolutely worth it! Beautiful view during sunrise, after we went down to visit travel point from the top. Lifetime experience.

reviews.name: Manuel Labor
reviews.review: The moment when The Sunrise up through the horizon is an amazing. You should prepare warm coat and wear enough clothing to withstand the cold.

placeDescription: Begin your day with a breathtaking sunrise over the travel point. Find the best spot at the View Point and watch as the sun slowly casts light over its surroundings. If you're lucky, you might even see the Milky Way! Your journey doesn't stop there though, because as you descend the view point, you'll see more gems that the travel point has to offer. Make way to many more photogenic spot. Don't forget to see the bonus travel point that will make you feel like you're in the middle of a fairy tale setting. If you're still up for more adventure, you can add a visit to bonus travel point to your itinerary!
